body_html:
All I run is the above command I printed, as you see I was missing the pip install stage.
However, I think we do need virtualenv, to make sure the builds stay isolated.
We do not want a pip package from a previous run to stay and cause some error messages on the machines.

body:
All I run is the above command I printed, as you see I was missing the pip install stage.
However, I think we do need virtualenv, to make sure the builds stay isolated.
We do not want a pip package from a previous run to stay and cause some error messages on the machines.
